A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie provided a ton of great forward movement and exploration of the force\, characters\, and strategic dynamics we've never seen before. It's interesting\, however\, that this movie seems to have garnered such a divided opinion. Many complained about how the Force Awakens retread the same ground as A New Hope\, but in trying new and fantastic things\, I found many of my friends didn't like the movie as I did. This is a movie I recommend seeing and forming your own opinions about. I thoroughly enjoyed every minute.
